full_threads.body:
Hi Bonnie,

Thanks for the update – we can see the recent changes reflected on the site. We'll continue to monitor the order statuses closely to ensure there are no ongoing issues with PayPal IPN.

Next Steps: Reprocessing Affected Orders
To address the orders currently marked as “On Hold,” you can manually reprocess them by following these steps:
  1. Go to WooCommerce > Orders
  2. Filter by the “On Hold” status
    For each affected order:
    • Click into the order
    • Confirm that the PayPal payment was successfully completed
    • If confirmed, change the order status to Processing
    • Click Update
This will allow the orders to proceed through the usual workflow and be exported as expected.

We're also happy to assist with updating the order statuses—just let us know which orders have confirmed PayPal payments, and we’ll take care of the rest.

We've attached the CSV file for the order from May 29, 2025 for your reference.

Let us know what works best for you.

Hi Joel,

Looks like I had updated the email elsewhere… I have updated now in WP.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au



http://www.mayohardware.com.au/



0408 331 966



Customer Service: 1300 360 211

Hi Bonnie,

I hope you are doing well.

We can still see "hardwarear@mayohardware.com.au" on bugzapperlamps paypal standard.
https://bugzapperlamps.com.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=wc-settings&tab=checkout&section=paypal

Hi Joel,

We have updated the email in WooCommerce to customerservice@mayohardware.com.au. Hopefully this resolves the issue.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager

Hi Sor,

I hope you are doing well.

It still the same issue with ipn.

Here are the 2 options we could do:

Option 1: Update the PayPal Email in WooCommerce

If customerservice@mayohardware.com.au is the correct PayPal account receiving payments, we recommend updating the WooCommerce PayPal settings:
  • Go to WooCommerce > Settings > Payments > PayPal
  • Replace the current email with customerservice@mayohardware.com.au
This ensures all IPN messages match the expected email and orders will automatically complete.

Option 2: Set Matching Email as Primary in PayPal

If both emails are linked to the same PayPal account, you can:
  • Log in to PayPal
  • Set hardwarear@mayohardware.com.au as the primary account email
    This will make IPNs send the matching email your site expects.

Let me know what you prefer.

Morning Joel,

After the changes that you made last time, we still haven't seen any of new Bug Zapper Lamps coming in so could you please check to see whether they are still on hold because of "due to a PayPal validation error " and if they are please export them, thanks.

Sopheat Sor

Business Systems Administrator





ssor@mayohardware.com.au



www.mayohardware.com.au





0458555430



Customer Service: 1300 360 211

If you are not the intended recipient, please contact the sender by reply e-mail and destroy all copies of the original message.

Hi Sor,

Thanks again for the quick call earlier.

Attached is the manually exported file for the orders placed on hold between May 3 and May 29. Please feel free to use it as needed.

PayPal IPN Issue – Fix Applied

Upon reviewing the issue with Bug Zapper Lamps orders being placed on hold, we’ve identified the root cause and implemented a fix on your site.
We’ve added a script that allows the system to accept PayPal IPN (Instant Payment Notification) responses from both of the following email addresses:
  • hardwarear@mayohardware.com.au
  • customerservice@mayohardware.com.au
This update should prevent future orders from being incorrectly flagged as “On Hold” due to mismatched email addresses in PayPal’s response.
We’ll continue to monitor the system over the next few days to ensure everything remains stable.

Next Steps: Reprocessing Affected Orders

To address the existing orders currently on hold, you can manually reprocess them using the following steps:
  1. Go to WooCommerce > Orders
  2. Filter by the “On Hold” status
  3. For each affected order:
    • Click into the order
    • Confirm that the PayPal payment was successfully completed
    • If confirmed, change the order status to Processing
    • Click Update

This will allow the orders to proceed through the normal workflow and be exported as expected.

Please let us know if you have any questions.

Hi Joel,

Can you please make both CustomerService@mayohardware.com.au and HardwareAR@Mayohardware.com.au for that Bugzapper Lamps paypal account and export those backlog orders so that they can come through, thanks.

Sopheat Sor

Business Systems Administrator





ssor@mayohardware.com.au



www.mayohardware.com.au





0458555430



Customer Service: 1300 360 211

Hi Sor,

Thank you for reaching out.

We’re currently investigating the issue with orders not coming through since 28/04/25 for Bug Zapper Lamps. Upon review, we’ve identified that several orders are being placed "On Hold" due to a PayPal validation error, which is preventing them from being exported properly.

The error message we are seeing is:
"Validation error: PayPal IPN response from a different email address (customerservice@mayohardware.com.au). Order status changed from Pending payment to On hold."
This suggests that the PayPal IPN response is coming from a different email address (customerservice@mayohardware.com.au ) than what is currently configured in the store (hardwarear@mayohardware.com.au ).

Could you please confirm whether there have been any recent changes to:
  • The PayPal account being used (e.g. new or updated email addresses),
  • Or the primary email address within the PayPal settings?

Hi support,


Could you please check to see why bugzapperlamps orders stop coming in since after 28/04/25?





Sopheat Sor
Business Systems Administrator


ssor@mayohardware.com.au

www.mayohardware.com.au


0458555430
